snippet: Nazareth, the defending city and state champion, was upset by Christ the King in the semifinals of the Catholic High School Athletic Association Brooklyn/Queens Division I girls tournament.
abstract: Christ the King defeats Nazareth, 54-53, in semifinals of Catholic High School Athletic Association Brooklyn/Queens Division I girls basketball tournament.
lead_paragraph: Nazareth, the defending city and state champion, was upset by Christ the King in the semifinals of the Catholic High School Athletic Association Brooklyn/Queens Division I girls tournament.

headline.seo: For Nazareth, a Loss Not Reflected in the Score
headline.main: For Nazareth, a Loss Not Reflected in the Score
headline.print_headline: For Nazareth, a Loss Not Reflected in the Score
